title: LIFELINE / HEART ATTACK
description: When you lose enough Health (Endurance), you have a heart attack. This is the freebie/tutorial.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "You feel something in your chest. A..."
dialogueTree.text: You feel something in your chest. An unnatural pressure. It's spreading to your left arm, your jaw...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "We've been here before. You've got..."
links.text: We've been here before. You've got this.

links.title: Endurance: "Nope, sorry, you don't. Not this ti..."
links.text: Nope, sorry, you don't. Not this time.

links.title: Half Light: "Fucking shit, I'm scared. What do I..."
links.text: Fucking shit, I'm scared. What do I do? Who do I call?

links.title: Composure: "Don't go grabbing at your chest and..."
links.text: Don't go grabbing at your chest and screaming bloody murder. Keep your cool. Remember -- looking good always makes you feel better.

links.title: You: "So I'm guessing this is bad."
links.text: So I'm guessing this is bad.

links.title: Endurance: "Very. *Very* bad. *This is the end*..."
links.text: Very. *Very* bad. *This is the end* bad.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Get it together, boy. You've gotta..."
links.text: Get it together, boy. You've gotta hold on, no matter how bad...

links.title: You: "I'm sure it's just heartburn. Oh go..."
links.text: I'm sure it's just heartburn. Oh god...

links.title: Endurance: "No. It's many years of combined sel..."
links.text: No. It's many years of combined self-neglect and self-abuse.

links.title: Endurance: "All you feel is pain and weakness...."
links.text: All you feel is pain and weakness. You have to surrender now. We all do, it gets *so* dark. You don't even see her face, like you always thought you would. You only see pain and fear.

links.title: Endurance: "There's no shame in surrendering no..."
links.text: There's no shame in surrendering now. We all do, it gets *so* dark. You don't even see her face, like you always thought you would. You only see pain and fear.

links.title: Endurance: "Yeah, screaming isn't happening on..."
links.text: Yeah, screaming isn't happening on account of extreme shortness of breath. You're just making it worse. Oh god, it's painful...

links.title: You: "The end of the world is here."
links.text: The end of the world is here.

links.title: Endurance: "Don't think this is a sign of anyth..."
links.text: Don't think this is a sign of anything other than your heart failing.
